title: The 22 most popular interpretations of seeing envy in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing envy in a dream? It indicates the presence of people monitoring the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing envy in a single man’s dream? Evidence of kindness and comfort, and the end of the envious is good news. What is the interpretation of seeing a well in a virgin girl’s dream? Elements of her brothers being jealous of her. Interpretation of seeing a married woman being jealous of her In the dream? It appears that they are actually feeling jealous. What is the interpretation of seeing envy? What proves that it is a woman and her star is light. What is the interpretation of the dream of envy by Ibn Sirin? The dream interpretation of envy in a dream indicates different interpretations, some good and some bad, and this is what Ibn Sirin confirmed. Then the dream of envy in the dream indicates the presence of people monitoring the dreamer’s life and planning to harm him. Then if one sees in the dream someone he is jealous of, this indicates the presence of bad friends in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of the dream of envy for single people: Seeing envy in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates kindness and comfort. Among the good news is getting rid of the envious person from her life. Seeing a well in a virgin girl’s dream is evidence of her brothers’ envy of her. Then the electric shock in the girl’s dream symbolizes that she is jealous of being provided with a good husband. Then for the girl who sees that she is dreaming, this indicates that A relative is jealous of her. What is the interpretation of a dream about envy for a married woman? If a married woman sees envy in a dream, this means that she is actually envied. Then, seeing envy is also evidence that she is a woman whose star is light. If a married woman sees an eye that she looks at in a dream This means that she is envied, whether that eye is animal or human. Hence, seeing an animal looking at him with extreme hatred is evidence of the presence of a jealous and envious man in her life. Seeing circles in a dream means that he has been jealous of her since childhood. Interpretation of a dream about envy for a pregnant woman. Vision A pregnant woman drinking a polluted and impure water source in a dream is evidence that she is affected by envy. Then for the spy who sees a pregnant woman in a dream, there is someone who claims to love her, but it is the opposite. Then, seeing envy in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a weak and easy birth. In general, it is considered Seeing envy in a dream is a sign of kindness and someone is trying to eavesdrop on her life. What is the interpretation of a dream about envy for a man? If one sees in a dream someone who envies him, then in reality he is envied, but he quickly ends this envy and survives. Then if he sees in a dream someone he knows If a man sees that he is jealous of people, this indicates that new friends are entering his life.

preview.html: As for seeing green onions, it reduces some people and urges them to learn the interpretation of this vision, so we will explain what is the interpretation of seeing green onions in a dream. Interpretation of seeing green onions in a dream by Ibn Sirin Imam Muhammad bin Sirin says that seeing the dreamer during his sleep green onions in a dream In general. It is one of the dreams that shows how close this person is to Almighty God. Also, this person maintains a sincere relationship with the Lord. Also about the dreamer seeing that he is cooking green onions in the dream. This vision shows this person’s desire to return to God with sincere repentance And not to commit any sin again in his life. Seeing green onions in the dreamer’s dream is evidence of the abundance of money that this dreamer possesses, which enables him to avoid many of the financial problems that some people suffer from. As for the dreamer who dreams, he buys fresh onions in a dream. A sign of the end of the health problems that this person suffers from and the ability to provide a healthy, happy and contented life. Interpretation of seeing green onions in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq sees the interpretation of seeing green onions in a dream in general. It is one of those dreams that carry within it many different interpretations. Which depends on the set of details that the dreamer saw during his sleep. About the dreamer who dreams that he is planting green onions. Evidence of this person’s ambition to reach the highest positions in society, and facilitate all his circumstances, God Almighty willing. He sees himself taking large quantities of fresh onions during his sleep. The dreamer. This vision means that this person will be able to overcome the financial obstacles in which he is currently living. If the dreamer sees himself distributing green onions to people in a dream. This vision means the ability of this person to impose his opinions on people, because he has great appreciation and respect from people See also: Seeing onions in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing green onions in a dream for a single girl. When a single girl sees cooked green onions in a dream. It is one of the dreams that indicate the security and peace that this girl enjoys next to her family, and that she derives her positive energy from her family. About An unmarried girl who dreams of having quantities of rotten green onions next to her. This vision means that this girl is far from her God. For this reason, this girl lives an unstable life and a life full of very exciting events. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is throwing green onions on The land. This vision indicates that this girl is getting a lot of money from a forbidden source. And they are doing some tricks to make money. Seeing a single girl picking fresh green onions from the ground while she is sleeping. It is one of the good dreams for this girl because she will meet a very suitable life partner and will be able to Live happily with him. Interpretation of seeing green onions in a dream for a married woman. There is a large group of dream interpretation scholars who discovered that a married woman saw green onions in her dream. It is one of the beautiful dreams that she sees in

title: Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Visiting the dead in a dream Seeing moreVisiting the dead in a dream Sometimes it is good that this visit heralds goodness for the deceased, but if the deceased was in a bad and sad state, it is a cause for concern, then the dream indicates the condition of its owner. What is the interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream? Through the site Various, which explains the interpretation of this The vision according to the interpretations of the leading scholars in interpreting dreams is as follows: In the event that the dreamer sees that a dead person came to him and visited him, and this dead person was the dreamer’s father, then this vision is an indication that the owner of this vision is in prison and imprisoned, then relief will be soon. It is an indication of his imminent release. While the sleeper, if the dead person comes to him in his dream, and then this dead person gives her good news, and this dreamer did not wrong anyone, then this vision is an indication that this dreamer will be supported by God, and he will soon return his rights. And if the deceased cries in his dream with a loud voice High and then left, this vision is an indication that the deceased is asking this dreamer to forgive him and forgive him for what he did wrong. A relative’s visit to the dreamer in his sleep is a sign from him that his worries and sadness will soon be erased and that God will grant him a lot of goodness. A visit to a deceased friend For his friend in a dream, it shows how close and loving they are to each other, and it also indicates the extent of faith that person has in the vision. As for the crying of the dead in the dreamer’s sleep, it indicates that the dreamer is suffering from a lot of sadness and distress, and that his sadness will be erased and replaced by joy and happiness. In the event that someone visits the dreamer and this deceased person died a long time ago, then this vision is an indication that the dreamer will be blessed by God with a long life and abundant livelihood. Interpretation of visiting a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirbin interprets this vision as follows: If a person sees in a dream that one of his relatives He dies in his hands and is sad. This vision is an indication that the dreamer is suffering from a lot of pressure at work and at home and cannot live happily. When the dead person comes to the dreamer and speaks to him sternly and harshly, this vision is an indication that the dreamer is very sinful and that the dead person has come to To him to offer him advice, repentance, and return. To his Lord and stop committing sins and abominations. As for the dreamer who saw himself cursing the deceased in his dream, this vision indicates that the deceased was unjust and that person was unjust in his life, and therefore the deceased came to him to ask for forgiveness and pardon for what he did. Giving the dead person some money in a dream indicates that the dead person is asking the dreamer for charity and giving him its reward in order to raise his status and atone for his sins. While the dead man who comes to the dreamer in a dream with a large ram and then slaughters it, this vision is an indication that this dead man was Fair and love mercy and charity to people, just as it is a good omen for the dreamer. That God grants him Hajj. And if the dead person comes in a person’s dream and after that he takes off the old, torn clothes that he was wearing and then puts on new and beautiful clothes, then this vision is a sign of forgiveness of sins and erasure. Of sins. Visiting the deceased in a dream, and this deceased was a pure person

To his Lord and stop doing sins and impurities. As for the dreamer who saw himself cursing the deceased in his dream, this vision indicates that the deceased was unjust and that that person was unjust in his life, so the deceased came to him to ask for forgiveness and forgiveness for what he did to him. That God will give him Hajj. And if the deceased comes in a person's dream and then takes off his old torn clothes that he was wearing and then wears new and beautiful clothes, this vision is a sign of forgiveness of sins and erasure. Of sins. And visiting the deceased in a dream, and this deceased was a righteous person

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing wine without drinking it in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing wine without drinking it in a dream. We will explain what the interpretation of dreaming about seeing wine without drinking it in a dream means all of this and more details that interest you, according to the interpretation conveyed by scholars. Interpretation of dreams about seeing wine without drinking it in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing wine without drinking it in a dream can indicate To temptation, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees wine without drinking it, it may express the temptation of those who hate you, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees wine without drinking it in a dream, this may be evidence of someone who hates it, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing wine without drinking it in a dream may It indicates a warning to those who hate you, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a relative drinking alcohol in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that you see a relative drinking alcohol in a dream could be evidence of happy news, God willing, as it may express a happy event, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees one of his relatives drinking alcohol, it may express About good things, and God knows the unseenIf the dreamer sees someone drinking alcohol in public places, this may indicate power and authority, and God knows the unseenInterpretation of a dream about seeing a bottle of wine in a dreamInterpretation of dreams Seeing a bottle of wine in a dream can be a sign of sin and God knows the unseenWhen the dreamer sees a bottle Empty wine, this may indicate exposure to trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees an empty wine bottle, this indicates that she will be exposed to crises, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of stealing wine in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about stealing wine may reflect changes for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen, whereas if a young man sees wine stolen, It may express the changes he is going through. If a married woman sees the theft of wine, this may reflect changes in her life, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees the theft of wine, this may reflect the changes she is facing, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about drinking wine at a wedding party in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drinking wine at a party Wedding in a dream, we did not find clear explanations for seeing that. However, seeing yourself drinking alcohol in a dream can be a sign of happiness, God willing. When you see a married woman drinking alcohol in a dream, this can be evidence of goodness and happiness, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl is seen drinking Alcohol may be a marriage, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself drinking alcohol in a dream, this may be evidence of a new beginning, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my wife drinking alcohol in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my wife drinking alcohol in a dream. Seeing a woman giving her husband alcohol with her and drinking with her could indicate stability. And happiness, and God knows the unseen. It can also express good relationships and stability, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a married woman, refusing to drink alcohol may indicate purity and chastity, and God knows best. The interpretation of drinking wine and not getting drunk in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about drinking wine and not getting drunk in a dream can portend righteous people, and God knows best. Unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about feces: seeing feces in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the impurity of an unmarried woman from the feces of a pregnant woman in her hand in front of people on the ground according to Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin and others. Feces in a dream is considered one of the most disgusting dreams and causes anxiety to the dreamer, as seeing feces in a dream for the dreamer is one of the visions that indicate many meanings, and visions of feces for people Different from visions of feces for the dreamer. Birds and animals, we will explain through our topic today the interpretation of seeing feces in a dream by the translator Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of feces in a dream Seeing feces or feces in a dream symbolizes money, as commentators interpreted feces in dreams as meaning that it may lead to travel or liberation from evil and disobedience. It is believed Stool in dreams indicates relief from suffering or relief from internal abdominal pain. Likewise, whoever sees while sleeping that he defecates in an empty or empty place, this indicates that this person will pay off his debts and that this will be easy after hardships. Whoever dreams that he defecates in front of people while they are watching him, this means This person will suffer from a scandal. Whoever sees in a dream that he defecates in the place where he sleeps, this indicates that the dreamer will divorce his wife or will be ill for a long time. Also, seeing someone defecating on himself in a dream means that this person will commit a sin. Likewise, the A person who wanted to travel and dreamed that he had passed a large amount of feces, then this is an indication that that person will not travel. The interpreters said that whoever saw in his dream that he defecated, and instead of feces he excreted worms or snakes, this means that this person will have many boys, But these children will be among the enemies. And in a dream, money. Whoever sees that he defecates hard, hard, then he spends money on the health of the body, and the liquid stool shows exorbitant expenses. And whoever defecates while the world is looking at him, let him beware of the scandal that appears to him or bad words. Whoever sees that he is eating bread and excretes, then he is eating bread and honey, and it was said: It is a violation of the Sunnah. And whoever defecates in bed, or divorces his wife, or is ill for a long time, and excrement is forbidden for money because of its unpleasant smell, and whoever deals in excrement will fall into distress, and whoever falls into a cage will be imprisoned. In sin, humiliation, or obscene speech, he fell, and the excrement is spoiled, rotten food. The exit of feces is a salvation from sin, and the exit of feces indicates the departure of a guest. Defecating in a dream is evidence of a man’s wealth or his secret, which he does not reveal. Perhaps defecation is a journey, as God Almighty says: {Or one of you goes to bed. Of defecation, it indicates atrophy, and excrement indicates the elimination of need, and indicates the disappearance of internal diseases, and indicates thoughts and whispers, the return of deposits, and the end of demand. If his smell appears or his clothes are soiled, or he comes out loudly, then it indicates worries, distress, and reputation. Bad deeds, kindness, religion, aborting pregnant women, slaves from it, and providing relief to those in need from it. And if he is impure with human excrement, then he is committing his religion or imitating it, and excrement is the food of immorality. And whoever sees that his pickles are many and wants to travel, then he should not travel; Because his path is cut off, and he eats up virginity and earnings, and her suffering deprives her of money

title: Interpretation of supplication in a dream for single, married, and pregnant girls

preview.html: A dream about supplication and supplication to Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shirin either in the rain, day or night, in prayer. Supplication in a dream is worshiped while awake or in prayer. It indicates the achievement of goals and sometimes appears to a child. A supplication in a dream may indicate a lack of rain if it is noisy. If the supplication requires prayer, and the supplication is known, then praying for it is obligatory. If a light prayer is performed, then it appears Ibn Mubarak. If he sees people gathered in prayer, then it is a meeting of children, and perhaps growth and blessing in blessings and livelihood, and the weakness of desires. Whoever dreams that he is praying to God or praying to Him, then goodness and happiness will affect him. It indicates need or debts. It was said: The answer is announced, especially if it is in one of the houses of God Almighty, such as a mosque, masjid, or shrine. And if the dreamer dreams that he is praying to God in the dark, then he will be saved from distress or illness. If he dreams that he is calling a man, then he is begging someone for fear of poverty, want, or need. The supplication in a person’s dream is worthy of praise if she is seen repeating it in her dream without crying, screaming, or shouting, and it often indicates acceptance or response. If a girl sees that she is begging God If she has sustenance or a decent living, her supplication will be answered, God willing, especially if she is awake and persistent in prayer. As for the girl who sees in her dream that she is asking God to grant her a good husband, this is a good interpretation, because it often indicates an answer, especially if the request is repeated. In her dream more. More than once, it was in a soft, calm, and beautiful voice. A supplication to facilitate or speed up marriage in a dream: “Oh God, marry me to a good man whose eyes please me and whose eyes please me, O Your Majesty and Honour.” Such a request in a dream can speed up or facilitate the marriage of an unmarried woman. A married woman’s prayer, if it is for her children, can be fulfilled, God willing, especially if the supplication is related to her success, success, and punishment. A married woman’s dream may be an indication of the children’s success in their studies or Her husband's success. In work, trade, or travel. As for a married woman who sees in her dream as if she is beseeching God to prolong her livelihood or increase her livelihood, he may give her good tidings of this, God willing, especially if she is awake. Many people will devote to her memory. And the glorification of prayer. Such a supplication is this supplication: “Oh God, protect me with what deprives you of what is forbidden, and I enrich myself with your grace from outside of you.” If a married woman sees in her dream that she is going to heaven and asks God to grant her a son or to become pregnant, then her request, God willing, will be accepted, especially if she maintains prayer, dhikr, etc. A matter of worship, and like those supplications that indicate the approaching pregnancy, God willing, this supplication is “O Merciful, grant us good and healthy offspring.” A pregnant woman’s supplication, if it is related to healing and facilitating pregnancy or childbirth, is often answered or indicates goodness in general, and such The supplication, this supplication is “O God, I ask you for good character and ease of divorce, the Creator of the soul from the soul, O the Savior of the soul from the soul, O the departure of the soul from the soul, redeem me.” That is, a pious and righteous man, all of his supplications in a dream will be answered, God willing.

It indicates the achievement of goals and sometimes appears to a child. A supplication in a dream may indicate a lack of rain if it is noisy. If the supplication requires prayer, and the supplication is known, then praying for it is obligatory. If a light prayer is performed, then it appears Ibn Mubarak. If he sees people gathered in prayer, then it is a meeting of children, and perhaps growth and blessing in blessings and livelihood, and the weakness of desires. title: Interpretation of the name Fahd in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: In this article, we look in detail at the interpretation of the name Tiger in a dream. The meaning of this name in the Arabic language refers to the tiger, which is one of the wildest types of animals. It is characterized by strength and high speed in running, and it also indicates inactivity and laziness. As it comes from the past tense verb ‘Fahd’, meaning the person who sleeps and forgets, and the bearers of this name are characterized by the ability to face difficulties and bear responsibility, in addition to being social personalities who tend to make new friends. As for its meaning in psychology, it indicates strength and courage, but what about its meaning in the world of dreams? We will know this in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of the name Fahd in a dream. Imam Al-Nabulsi mentioned that seeing a tiger in a dream indicates the high status, courage and boldness that the dreamer enjoys. This dream is one of the good dreams that portend good, because it is related to hunting, and hunting is related to livelihood, and it also shows the ability to face problems in reality, and God knows best. These were the most prominent interpretations of the name Fahd in a dream, and at the end of this article we must note that all these interpretations mentioned are only the efforts of dream interpretation jurists, which means that we cannot be sure that they are true in reality because God alone knows the unseen. To interpret another dream, you can download the Dream Interpretation Instant application from the encyclopedia.

title: Secrets of interpreting filth in a dream from Al-Nabulsi for good and evil

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream? According to what was indicated by the great scholar and jurist Nabulsi, the sleeper may see in his dream that dust fills his clothes, or he may see the sky raining dust, or he may see that he is cleaning the floors from dirt. When he wakes up, he wonders about the interpretation of this vision and wants to know its interpretation. Dream interpretation scholars have explained that this dream varies depending on the social status of the dreamer, and that is why we will explain to you through the following encyclopedia the interpretation of seeing dust in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and another. The pregnant woman even follows us. Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: The scholar and jurist Muhammad Ratib Al-Nabulsi says: If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is digging from the ground and extracting dirt, then this is an unpleasant vision. But if the dreamer is traveling and sees in his dream that he is digging from the ground and taking out dirt, then this A good vision warns him of obtaining a large and blessed livelihood. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is shaking his clothes to remove dirt, this is an unpleasant vision and indicates the loss of money and the arrival of poverty in the dreamer’s life. But if he sees that he is hitting the ground forcefully with his hand, this is a sign that the dreamer will achieve great profits. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is walking on dirt, or picking up dirt while walking, this is good news for him that he will get a lot of money. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is collecting dirt from his house, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money from his wife. But if he sees that he is removing dirt from the house, then this is a sign of his wife’s poverty and the loss of her money. Seeing dust falling from the sky in a dream is a good vision that indicates that the dreamer is a good person. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is throwing dirt on his head, then this is a sign that he is removing dirt from the house. An unpleasant vision that indicates that sorrows and misfortunes will come to the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream for a single woman: Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees dirt in her dream, this is a good vision that heralds the achievement of all the goals she seeks. But if an unmarried girl sees dirt in her dream, this is a good vision that heralds the achievement of all the goals she seeks. Her dream is that she is wiping her house to remove dirt from it, then this indicates the failure of her romantic relationship with the man she loves. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that dirt has stuck to her clothes, then this is a vision that heralds the imminent date of her marriage in the very near future. And if she sees in her dream that she is walking on Dirt, this is a good vision that indicates that the dreamer will obtain a prestigious job. Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees dirt in her dream, this is a vision that foretells her that she will obtain ample sustenance. Also, seeing dirt in a married woman’s dream means that her husband will receive A lot of money. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing dirt in a married woman’s dream symbolizes inheritance. Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees dirt in her dream, this is a vision that promises her that God will give birth to a male for her. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she You walk on the dirt

If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she You walk on the dirt

title: Interpretation of seeing complex numbers in a dream, the meaning of numbers in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In today's article we talk about the interpretation of seeing complex numbers in a dream, through the encyclopedia website, we also quote the interpretation of complex numbers from Ibn Sirin, where he gave several interpretations and indications about the presence of complex numbers in a dream, so we present to you the interpretation of seeing complex numbers in a dream below. Interpretation of seeing complex numbers In a dream, many people wonder about the meaning of signs and numbers in a dream, and whether this dream portends good or bad, so in this paragraph we discuss the interpretation of seeing complex numbers in a dream in detail below. Dream interpretation and astronomy scholars indicate that complex numbers in a dream have meanings. There are many interpretations, so initially the dreamer’s lifestyle must be known in order to interpret the dream correctly. The dream of complex numbers is interpreted well and each number is interpreted separately. Dream number 142 is interpreted that the number one hundred shows the dreamer’s endurance and patience in sadness, and forty is a sign of... That relief is approaching his life and the number 2 shows that the dreamer’s number could be a happy and stable marriage. Seeing complex numbers is interpreted and the dreamer feels sad that these numbers are his sins, and the dream was a warning sign to stay away from immorality and get closer to God Almighty. Interpretations of numbers vary from person to person and each A number that has a different meaning and sign and is related to the dreamer’s life. A dream about the number 55 has been interpreted as an indication of the expansion of the scope of living, as the number fifty carries the meaning of relief and good money and work, and the number five is the dreamer’s sustenance with what he seeks. Interpretation of seeing numbers in a dream for a married womanIn this paragraph, We examine in detail the interpretation of seeing numbers in a dream for a married woman below. If a married woman sees the number zero in a dream, this explains the meaning of nutrition, because it indicates that she is pregnant with a beautiful and healthy child. Scholars of dream interpretation and visions indicate that a married woman’s dream of the number three is to be healthy. She is good and has a family that cares for her and loves her. Seeing the number seven in a married woman’s dream means that she will have abundant sustenance in the world and achieve what she wants in the near future. Dreaming of the number four in a married woman’s dream interprets that she is going through a crisis that is afflicting her life. However, the vision brings Good news about the approaching Gulf. Seeing the number five in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is suffering from psychological crises, and the vision came to clarify that the problem has passed and the situation has changed to safety and security. Interpretation of seeing complex numbers in a dream for a man after eating. Interpretation of seeing complex numbers in a dream for a manAt the beginning of the article In this paragraph, we consider the interpretation of seeing complex numbers in a dream for a man in detail in the following lines. Scholars of dream interpretation and visions indicate that a man’s dream of the second number is evidence of an abundance of sustenance, as the dream interprets that the dreamer’s money will multiply and increase, and it is one of the good visions. Seeing the number six In a man’s dream, it means that he is suffering from problems in his life that cause him psychological crises, but the dream shows the end of these crises and the return of life to stability again.

title: Interpretation of earth in a dream. Meaning of earth in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the land for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, whether it is crushing, disintegrating, buying, selling, plowing, walking, planting, walking, red and green, and a vast, barren desert according to Ibn Sirin and beyond. Interpretation of the land in a dream. Ibn Sirin said that seeing the land In a dream, it means earthly life with everything that heaven contains on the last day, and seeing the earth in a dream for a woman who gives birth and gives birth is like cultivated and plowed land. Whoever dreams that he is selling his land or sees that he has left his land, then he will die if he is afflicted with a disease, and for one who intends to travel, this is a sign On his travel. Whoever sees in his dream that the land is torn or torn apart and a young man comes out of it, then hatred and hostility will appear in that place, and if an old man comes out he rules the place. It indicates torment, and if it splits and a seed emerges from it, it indicates goodness and fertility in that place. Whoever sees that he is digging in the ground and eating sand and dirt, then he conspires with others to get money. Whoever sees that the earth speaks to him, he possesses goodness in this world and justice in the world. ReligionInterpretations of worldly dreams: And whoever sees himself outside the land, this is evidence that he will leave his mother or divorce his wife, and this may be evidence that he will sell one of his homes. But if he sees himself digging the earth and eating dirt in his mouth, this indicates that he will soon obtain huge sums of money. And whoever sees that The earth has opened and an animal has emerged from it, so this is evidence that the dreamer’s death is approaching. Earth: Any land according to its nature and essence. Seeing gathering land indicates hiding secrets and safety from fear, and seeing agricultural land indicates fertility. And whoever dreams that he is in a vast land, then he travels, and the land shows gossip that he cannot hide, and it indicates disagreement or knowledge. Interpretation of the land in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Daniel said: Her dreams were expressed by a woman. And whoever dreams: that he is in a vast desert land, and this land is not far, then he will travel Soon. And whoever dreams: that he is digging the earth and eating its dirt, he will find money. And whoever sees: that he is digging the earth like a hole or a cellar, then he will take money by cunning and deception. And whoever dreams: that the earth swallowed him, then he will fall into sadness, calamity, misguidance, and affliction, or the woman will destroy his money. And whoever sees: that he has moved from a spacious land to a narrow land, then Abu Bakr Al-Siddiq, may God be pleased with him, said: He is moving from Islam to disbelief. And whoever dreams: that the earth has folded under his feet, it is evidence of the end of his life. And whoever sees: that the earth is trembling, it is fear. And whoever dreams that he has a known land that expands his vision, he will encounter a woman whose danger to people is equal to the extent of the land. And whoever sees that she owns a large, unknown land, it is as low as the capacity of this land, and perhaps it was safe because men were created from it, and perhaps she was a man’s wife. Because it was plowed. And whoever sees that he is in a wide, flat land that he does not know, he will sing. And whoever dreams: that he is sitting on the ground, then he can do it and excel at it, according to the Almighty’s saying: (And you are firm on the ground). And whoever sees: that he is hitting the ground with something, then he travels. On a journey in search of food, according to the Almighty’s words: “And they struck the land with the goodness of God.” And whoever dreams: that he sold land or fell
